problem: 长清区政府准备在大学城修建一座高AB=6m的过街天桥,已知天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角∠ACB的正弦值为\frac{1}{3},则坡面AC的长度为()m
answer: 解:∵天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角∠ACB的正弦值为\frac{1}{3},∴sin∠ACB=\frac{AB}{AC}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{6}{AC}=\frac{1}{3},解得:AC=18．则坡面AC的长度为18m．故选:C．
comment: 此题主要考查了解直角三角形的应用,熟练应用锐角三角函数关系是解题关键．
problem_en: The Changqing District Government is preparing to build an overpass with a height of AB = N_0 in the University City. It is known that the angle between the slope AC of the overpass and the ground BC ∠ACB has a sine value of \frac{N_1}{N_2}, so the length of the slope AC is ()
